group_1.textLeft: Welcome!@Please take a seat wherever you'd like.

group_1.textRight: Thanks.
(Now, she's...)
...Hello. Did I keep you waiting?

group_1.textLeft: Not at all, I've only just arrived.

group_1.textRight: Really? Well, that's good.
So, what can I do for you today?

group_1.textLeft: Allow me to get straight to the point.
I'm seeking information regarding the Witch@your group struggled against.

group_1.textRight: What makes you think it was a Witch?

group_1.textLeft: There were no factional conflicts that day.
By process of elimination, that leaves@only a Witch.

group_1.textRight: Weeell, I'd tell you, but...
Unfortunately, I don't think you have@any info I want.
It's not an information exchange if you don't@have anything interesting to share, you know~?

group_1.textLeft: My... Normally, you would put it on my tab...
Or...is there a reason you don't want to@disclose that information?

group_1.textRight: It's just something really inconvenient for us.
Although, I guess you already know about that.

group_1.textLeft: Regarding Sae Kirino...indeed, I do...
I don't know the precise details, but@unfortunate accidents befall all of us.
However...if there is a clear cause for this incident,@and it's not due to your negligence...
I believe we should deal with it early@and nip it in the bud.

group_1.textRight: Well, that Witch is certainly a nuisance, sure,@but...
Nobody's gonna run into it for a while,@even if we let it be.
It's really good at hide-and-seek.

group_1.textLeft: You mean...

group_1.textRight: If there's nothing else to talk about, I'll be off.

group_1.textLeft: ...Please wait.
I've also heard that you're suspending your@activities as bodyguards.

group_1.textRight: ...You've really got ears everywhere, huh?

group_1.textLeft: The loss of a Kamihama Magical Girl is@quite regrettable, but...
Will you resume your activities after@your hiatus?

group_1.textRight: I don't know...it depends on what the@three of us decide in the end...

group_1.textLeft: I see...

group_1.textRight: Did you want to hire us for something?

group_1.textLeft: No...however, ever since your group began@your bodyguard activities...
It seems to me that your atmosphere@has changed.
I was merely curious to see how you@would grow.

group_1.textRight: Ahaha, so you were observing us like that.
...Well, but...
If we can't take care of others,@we're better off stopping.

group_1.textCenter: (Our reputation as bodyguards has hit@rock-bottom since we let Sae die...)
(Kamihama's become a more unfavorable@environment for us...)
(If this is the outcome of changing@the way we live as Magical Girls...)
(I guess...we should go back to@the way we were...)
(I'm the one who suggested the idea@in the first place, so...)
(I should be the one to bring it up to them.)
(We should stop being bodyguards...@...and start over...)
